languages.text: "Легкое прощение есть признак наступающей слабости, Вольный Торговец. Подумай об этом". {n}Арджента неохотно убирает руку с оружия.{/n}
"Easy forgiveness is a sign of impending weakness, Rogue Trader. Think on this." {n}Argenta reluctantly lifts her hand from her weapon.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Легкое прощение есть признак наступающей слабости, Вольный Торговец. Подумай об этом". {n}Арджента неохотно убирает руку с оружия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Forgiving easily is a sign of upcoming weakness, Rogue Trader. Think about it." {n}Argenta reluctantly takes her hand away from her weapon.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “轻言原谅是内心软弱的表现，行商浪人，好好想想吧。”{n}阿洁塔不情不愿地收起武器。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Easy forgiveness is a sign of impending weakness, Rogue Trader. Think on this." {n}Argenta reluctantly lifts her hand from her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “轻言原谅是内心软弱的表现，行商浪人，好好想想吧。”{n}阿洁塔不情不愿地收起武器。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «La compasión obsequiosa es una señal de inminente debilidad, Comerciante Independiente. Téngalo presente». {n}Argenta retira a regañadientes la mano de la empuñadura de su arma.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Easy forgiveness is a sign of impending weakness, Rogue Trader. Think on this." {n}Argenta reluctantly lifts her hand from her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «La compasión obsequiosa es una señal de inminente debilidad, Comerciante Independiente. Téngalo presente». {n}Argenta retira a regañadientes la mano de la empuñadura de su arma.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Accorder son pardon facilement est un signe de faiblesse, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Pensez-y. » {n}De mauvaise grâce, Argenta retire la main de la poignée de son arme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Easy forgiveness is a sign of impending weakness, Rogue Trader. Think on this." {n}Argenta reluctantly lifts her hand from her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Accorder son pardon facilement est un signe de faiblesse, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Pensez-y. » {n}De mauvaise grâce, Argenta retire la main de la poignée de son arme.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Rasches Verzeihen ist ein Zeichen drohender Schwäche, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Denkt darüber nach." {n}Argenta nimmt widerwillig die Hand von ihrer Waffe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Easy forgiveness is a sign of impending weakness, Rogue Trader. Think on this." {n}Argenta reluctantly lifts her hand from her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Rasches Verzeihen ist ein Zeichen drohender Schwäche, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Denkt darüber nach." {n}Argenta nimmt widerwillig die Hand von ihrer Waffe.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「安易に許しを与えるのは弱さの表れです、自由開拓者。よくお考え下さい」{n}アルジェンタはしぶしぶ武器から手を離す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Easy forgiveness is a sign of impending weakness, Rogue Trader. Think on this." {n}Argenta reluctantly lifts her hand from her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「安易に許しを与えるのは弱さの表れです、自由開拓者。よくお考え下さい」{n}アルジェンタはしぶしぶ武器から手を離す。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Kolay affetmek, zayıflık göstergesidir Hür Tacir. Bunu aklında bulundur." {n}Argenta, elini gönülsüzce silahından çekiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Easy forgiveness is a sign of impending weakness, Rogue Trader. Think on this." {n}Argenta reluctantly lifts her hand from her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kolay affetmek zayıflık göstergesidir Hür Tacir. Bunu düşün biraz." {n}Argenta, elini gönülsüzce silahından çekiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
